definition: to spit/to send out (silk from a silkworm, bolls from cotton flowers etc)/to say/to pour out (one's grievances)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to take in and send out (in large quantities)
to hum and haw (idiom); to mumble as if hiding sth/to speak and break off, then start again/to hold sth back
to hum and haw (idiom); to mumble as if hiding sth/to speak and break off, then start again/to hold sth back
Tubo or Tufan, old name for Tibet/the Tibetan Tubo dynasty 7th-11th century AD/also pr. [Tu3 fan1]
to pour out (emotions)/to unburden oneself (of strong feelings)/to vomit comprehensively
diction/enunciation/to pronounce the words correctly (in opera)
to have bitter digestive fluids rising to the mouth/fig. to complain bitterly/to pour out one's sufferings
to swallow clouds and blow out fog (idiom)/to blow cigarette or opium smoke
to exhale/to blow off steam/(phonetics) aspirated

sentences.english: K. sobbing so hard I thought she would puke.
sentences.chinese: 她哭得很厉害，我都以为她要吐了。

sentences.english: The boy took one sip of the wine and spat it out.
sentences.chinese: 孩子吃掉了药丸外面的糖衣，却把药心吐了出来。

sentences.english: He spat at the lonely cigarette, misty smoke wind.
sentences.chinese: 他吐着寂寞的烟卷，飘渺的烟雾随风而散。

sentences.english: To make matters worse, Mr Berntsen Larsen quickly threw up after entering the tank, which was standing room only.
sentences.chinese: 更糟的是，他一进入仅有立足之地的马桶就吐了。

sentences.english: Is the phlegm thin and white?
sentences.chinese: 他咳吐的痰是稀白的么？

sentences.english: but he could not get the words out of his parched throat.
sentences.chinese: 焦干的嗓子却吐不出一个字。

sentences.english: The boy threw up his dinner again.

sentences.chinese: 这却是她的肺腑之言，难得是酒后，轻易便吐了出来。

sentences.english: But is it even possible not to spit during a match?
sentences.chinese: 但是，在比赛中间一口唾沫都不吐，这可能么？

sentences.english: Ipecac can leave you throwing up for hours.
sentences.chinese: 吐可以让你缓解大概几个小时。

sentences.english: A cloth had been spread over a little round table on which was a vase of fragrant plum blossom.

sentences.english: But emesis is prohibited for pregnant women and must be applied cautiously to the weak.
sentences.chinese: 但是吐法禁用于妊娠妇女，慎用于体弱者。

sentences.english: The difference between bleeding nose and spitting.
I'm pleased to brother in the four class vomit vomit tongue.
sentences.chinese: 我高兴的向哥哥所在的四一班吐了吐舌头。

sentences.english: A false witness that speaketh lies, and he that soweth discord mong brethren.
sentences.chinese: 吐谎言的假见证，并弟兄中布散纷争的人。

sentences.english: In addition to vomit your face emerge spittle, you Mandehuaya play.
sentences.chinese: 除了吐你们满脸满身唾沫，还打得你们满地找牙。

big mouthful (of food, drink, smoke etc)/open mouth/gulping/gobbling/gaping
